Name: VHIL_H100_VehFunc_BrakeLamp_FrontSwitchDebounce_Neutral

Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V
2. Turn Ignition ON.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]
3. Crank the vehicle[HIL_Mdl_Engine_Start_SW=1]

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS= 0% to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED = 0kmph

 3.1. Cluster should display BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_FRONT_VEHICLE_BRAKE_STATUS = 0x1 (Brake actuated)
 3.2. Check in cluster:Neutral gear and speed 0kmph
 3.3. Brake lamp should ON

1. Turn Ignition OFF.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 0]
2. Set Battery Voltage to 0V
